settings.desc_heading: Our natural solution to healthier skin!
settings.product_desc: The Derma Relief Cream is a gentle solution containing lysates derived from naturally occurring good microbes and other defined ingredients. It does not contain any synthetic fragrances and has been carefully formulated to restore healthy skin across all ages and all skin types.
settings.use_desc: Apply directly to affected regions, 4 times daily.

settings.size_heading: A naturally derived active ingredient from Lactobacillus found on skin
settings.desc_heading:
Lactobacillus is a good microbe in the human body and on the human skin. The SkinBiome Co.’s Derma Relief Cream contains Dermafixium, a naturally derived microbial extract from the human Lactobacillus strain found on skin.
This was made possible by our Founder, Dr Davide Pennino, through his decades of deep scientific research.

settings.loop_description:
The SkinBiome Co.’s Derma Relief Cream contains a naturally derived active ingredient that is steroid-free and safe for multiple skin types.

Never worry about burning sensations and stinging again!
